releaseNotes: We continue to update our app to help you find your perfect somewhere.
description:
Find and book your perfect somewhere with the Hotels.com app. 

 

GET REWARDED THROUGH OUR APP 

• Access Member Prices* of 10% or more on over 100,000 hotels worldwide. 

• Rewards can add up fast when you have the choice of staying at over 500,000 eligible properties worldwide—so you can get rewarded while you sleep 

• Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at select VIP Access properties 

 
 

DON’T LET THE NAME FOOL YOU—WE’RE MORE THAN JUST HOTELS 

• Easily find holiday homes, apartments, resorts and more on our app—we have every kind of property for almost every kind of trip. So, whether it’s a short business trip or a long holiday, choose from over 500,000 properties worldwide. 

• Filter by theme for different types of trips 

• See the property’s location with the map view • Read verified guest reviews 

• Save your favourites 

 
 

FAST, EASY & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP 

• Pay now or later on most hotels—you choose whether you want to pay online or at the property 

• Save your payment details securely to book future stays even more quickly 

• Use Apple Pay® to book your stay 

• Enjoy flexible booking options on most hotels* 

 

 
 

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION 

• Save your confirmation and access your booking details anytime—even offline 

• Easily manage your booking on the go. You can change or cancel if something comes up 

• Help is only a few taps away. Contact us or the property directly from the app 

• Opt in for push notifications and we’ll send you updates about your stay 

• Use Siri shortcuts to quickly access your booking details 

 

 
 

*Hotels.com Rewards is open only to individuals who are eighteen (18) and older. When you book and stay 1 night at eligible properties, you’ll get 1 stamp. Collect 10 stamps and you’ll get 1 reward night to redeem at a Hotels.com Rewards eligible pre-pay property (as identified on the site). The maximum value of the reward night is the average daily rate of your ten (10) stamps collected, excluding taxes and applicable fees. The value of your reward night doesn’t count towards any applicable taxes or fees. Excludes package bookings (where available) and bookings made using a coupon. Your reward nights and/or your collected stamps will expire if you have not collected a stamp and/or redeemed a reward night using your Hotels.com® Rewards account in the previous 12 months. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html. Member Prices are available to Hotels.com app users, Hotels.com Rewards members and individuals who unlock Member Prices by subscribing to Hotels.com by email. Available on selected hotels and selected dates only. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html. Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24–48 hours before check-in. See property pages on our app for details. 

 
 
 
 

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html
